00092 template <typename AttributeImpl>
00093 bool CPropertiesManager::RegisterAttributeType()
00094 {
00095        return s_attributesFactory.RegisterFactory(new istd::TSingleFactory<iser::IObject, AttributeImpl>(AttributeImpl::GetTypeName()), true);
00096 }
